articles.title: Ariel Helwani Gets MAD at Chael Sonnen for Saying No One Knew About Weili vs Shevchenko!
articles.description: Chael Sonnen just left Ariel Helwani‚Äôs studio ‚Äî and let‚Äôs just say things got tense. Chael reveals that Ariel was irritated with him after Chael said he didn‚Äôt even know Weili Zhang and Valentina Shevchenko were fighting until last week. But here‚Äôs the twist: even Ariel hadn‚Äôt promoted the fight on his own show. Chael questions how a supposed ‚Äúsuperfight‚Äù between two all-time greats could fly under everyone‚Äôs radar ‚Äî including ESPN, the UFC, and even Helwani himself. Sonnen breaks down why the UFC‚Äôs marketing dropped the ball, how Valentina‚Äôs incredible career has been hidden in co-main events, and why fans (and media) deserve better. üî• Full of classic Chael logic, dry humor, and uncomfortable truths. #ChaelSonnen #ArielHelwani #UFC #WeiliZhang #ValentinaShevchenko #MMA #UFCNews #Bullet #UFCMedia #HelwaniShow #MMAFighting Bad Guy Inc merch now available at https://BadGuyInc.com Click here to subscribe: https://bit.ly/3FrHIPK Follow me on IG: https://bit.ly/3HY7BIE Follow me on Twitter: https://bit.ly/3tvY5J7 Follow me on Threads https://www.threads.com/@sonnench

articles.title: UFC 322: Islam Makhachev under pressure, female GOAT talk, more! | Overreaction Time
articles.description: "Overreaction Time" (Tuesdays, noon ET) is a weekly podcast hosted by MMA Junkie managing editor Simon Samano where he shares his "overreactions" with an MMA Junkie staff member, and the debate begins! On this edition, he and MMA Junkie reporter Nolan King discuss the following: (00:00) - Intro (01:25) - UFC 322: Even though Jack Della Maddalena is the champion, Islam Makhachev has more at stake. (08:09) - UFC 322: Whoever wins between Valentina Shevchenko and Zhang Weili will establish herself as the second greatest female fighter ever. (15:17) - UFC 322: Outside of the main and co-main, the fighter under the most pressure is Bo Nickal. (22:03) - Francis Ngannou is above fighting Jake Paul and was smart to decline his offer. (27:49) - Dana White‚Äôs big talk of cracking down on fight-fixing means nothing without any action. articles.title: UFC Card's Over Budget
articles.description: Dana White is facing one of his toughest challenges yet ‚Äî a UFC event at the White House with unprecedented logistics and exploding costs. Chael Sonnen breaks down the details, explaining why this card is a massive headache behind the scenes, and why Dana White rarely gets credit for pulling off these impossible shows. Discover the behind-the-scenes chaos of planning a historic UFC event and why making it happen at the White House is no small feat. #DanaWhite #UFC #WhiteHouseEvent #MMA #ChaelSonnen #UFCHistory #FightBusiness #MMABehindTheScenesBad Guy Inc merch now available at https://BadGuyInc.com Click here to subscribe: https://bit.ly/3FrHIPK Follow me on IG: https://bit.ly/3HY7BIE Follow me on Twitter: https://bit.ly/3tvY5J7 Follow me on Threads https://www.threads.com/@sonnench

articles.title: Can Alex Pereira Ignore Khamzat Chimaev?
articles.description: Go to my sponsor https://gametime.go.link/lawZm to download the Gametime app and use code chael for $20 off first purchase! #GametimePartner Click here to subscribe: https://bit.ly/3FrHIPK Chael Sonnen breaks down the looming clash between Alex Pereira and Khamzat Chimaev. Pereira is one win away from cementing his GOAT status, but can he truly ignore the undefeated Chimaev? Chael dives into callouts, rivalries, and the rules of respect in the UFC ‚Äî explaining what it really takes to dominate a division and make history. Get the inside perspective on strategy, fight psychology, and why every move in this matchup matters. This isn‚Äôt just about two fighters ‚Äî it‚Äôs about legacy, challenge, and the path to greatness. üîî Subscribe for more UFC analysis, fight breakdowns, and Chael Sonnen‚Äôs unfiltered takes. #UFC #AlexPereira #KhamzatChimaev #GOATDebate #ChaelSonnen #MMA #FightAnalysis #UFCNews Bad Guy Inc merch now available at https://BadGuyInc.com Follow me on IG: https://bit.ly/3HY7BIE Follow me on Twitter: https://bit.ly/3tvY5J7 Follow me on Threads https://www.threads.com/@sonnench

articles.title: Chael Sonnen Explains Why Mokaev Deserves Another UFC Shot
articles.description: Chael Sonnen breaks down one of the most fascinating redemption stories in MMA ‚Äî the rise, fall, and rebirth of Mohammad Mokaev. Once a 14‚Äì0 phenom ranked top-3 in the world, Mokaev suddenly found himself off the main card, out of the UFC, and facing rumors that his contract ‚Äî or reputation ‚Äî had run out. But as Chael reveals, what happened next defines character. Mokaev didn‚Äôt complain, didn‚Äôt point fingers ‚Äî he went to work. Competing in Brave CF, taking grappling matches, and showing he‚Äôs still one of the most skilled and disciplined fighters on the planet. Sonnen calls Mokaev‚Äôs journey a ‚Äúcase study‚Äù in how a fighter handles adversity the right way ‚Äî with humility, consistency, and class. From owning past mistakes to earning another shot at the big stage, Chael believes Mokaev‚Äôs story isn‚Äôt finished ‚Äî it‚Äôs just getting started. ‚ÄúIf he makes it back,‚Äù Chael says, ‚Äúthe UFC won‚Äôt rebuild him ‚Äî they‚Äôll fast-track him.‚Äù This is more than a comeback story. It‚Äôs about accountability, growth, and the fighter‚Äôs code ‚Äî something Chael Sonnen knows better than anyone. #MohammadMokaev #ChaelSonnen #UFC #MMA #BraveCF #Redemption #UFCReturn #FighterMindset Click here to subscribe: https://bit.ly/3FrHIPK Follow me on IG: https://bit.ly/3HY7BIE Follow me on Twitter: https://bit.ly/3tvY5J7 Follow me on Threads https://www.threads.com/@sonnench

articles.title: Fight-Fixing Fallout: UFC Fighter Demands ‚ÄòReward Money‚Äô from FBI
articles.description: Get 15% OFF The House of Atlas Razor Kit + Before and After Set with the code CHAEL at https://www.houseofatlas.com/CHAEL! #houseofatlaspodchael UFC veteran Drakkar Klose has shocked the MMA world by publicly offering to provide the FBI with information on potential fight-fixing. In the midst of the ongoing UFC betting scandal, Klose reportedly tagged FBI Director Cash Patel in an Instagram post, offering a few names in exchange for reward money. MMA fans and insiders are questioning how serious this offer was, and Chael Sonnen breaks down the story, weighing the credibility of the claims and the context of UFC betting controversies. In this video, we dive deep into: Drakkar Klose‚Äôs statement and intentions The scope of the UFC fight-fixing scandal Betting limits, prop bets, and what really goes on behind the scenes Chael Sonnen‚Äôs expert perspective on the MMA world and UFC integrity Stay up to date on the latest MMA news, UFC scandals, and insider commentary by subscribing and turning on notifications. Don‚Äôt miss this breakdown of one of the most shocking moments in UFC betting history. articles.title: Did You Know the Bullet was Fighting on UFC 322?
articles.description: Chael Sonnen dives into the story of The Bullet, one of MMA‚Äôs most fascinating legends. From multi-division champion to mentor for her own sister, Chael breaks down why her career is nothing short of extraordinary. Known for allegedly speaking seven languages, training military operatives in armed and unarmed combat, and holding one of the most dominant world championship records in MMA, The Bullet is a figure of folklore and excellence. Sonnen also explores the challenges surrounding her upcoming superfight, including the vacated division, co-main placement, and the pressures of legacy. Chael shares his perspective on why The Bullet‚Äôs story goes beyond wins and losses ‚Äî it‚Äôs about influence, skill, and respect in the sport. He highlights the fascinating details of her career, the strategic decisions in her fights, and what makes her one of the most secure champions in MMA history. Whether you‚Äôre a die-hard MMA fan or new to the sport, this video gives unparalleled insight into the career of a fighter who continues to set the standard for greatness. #TheBullet #ChaelSonnen #UFC #MMA #Superfight #LegendaryFighter #WomenInMMA #MMAHistoryBad Guy Inc merch now available at https://BadGuyInc.com Click here to subscribe: https://bit.ly/3FrHIPK Follow me on IG: https://bit.ly/3HY7BIE Follow me on Twitter: https://bit.ly/3tvY5J7 Follow me on Threads https://www.threads.com/@sonnench

articles.title: UFC fighters were offered money to throw fights‚Ä¶ #ufc
articles.description: Former UFC fighter Chael Sonnen breaks down the latest controversy surrounding Vince Morales and claims that fighters are being offered money to take a dive. Is this real ‚Äî or just bar talk? Chael shares his thoughts on how fight fixing really works (or doesn‚Äôt) in MMA, what sportsbooks would actually allow, and why the numbers don‚Äôt add up. With decades inside the fight game, Chael gives an insider‚Äôs look at the realities of betting, undercard payouts, and why the idea of a $70,000 wager on a low-card bout just doesn‚Äôt make sense. üëâ Subscribe for more honest takes from Chael Sonnen ‚Äî straight talk on MMA, UFC news, fight rumors, and behind-the-scenes stories from the world of combat sports.

articles.title: Francis Ngannou REJECTS Jake Paul #ufc
articles.description: Chael Sonnen reacts to Francis Ngannou turning down a fight offer ‚Äî and he doesn‚Äôt hold back. In this clip, Chael breaks down what it really means to be a ‚Äúprize fighter,‚Äù why calling TMZ isn‚Äôt the move, and why refusing a challenge in public says everything about a fighter‚Äôs mindset. Watch Chael unpack the psychology, the pride, and the money behind Ngannou‚Äôs decision ‚Äî and why on Chael‚Äôs playground, there‚Äôs only one rule: you don‚Äôt back down. üëâ Comment below ‚Äî was Francis right to pass, or should a real prize fighter always step up?

articles.title: Rhonda Rousey says she‚Äôs the GOAT
articles.description: Chael Sonnen reacts to Ronda Rousey‚Äôs claim that she‚Äôs the greatest of all time ‚Äî and explains why that definition doesn‚Äôt quite work. Chael breaks down the difference between dominance in your era and true greatness, why early women‚Äôs MMA rankings were incomplete, and why, despite everything, he still defends Ronda‚Äôs impact on the sport. In classic Chael fashion, he gives credit where it‚Äôs due ‚Äî but calls out the myth of the ‚Äúuntouchable GOAT.‚Äù üëâ Watch now and tell us: does Ronda still deserve the title of the greatest?

articles.title: Daniel Cormier REACTS to Jon Jones calling Tom Aspinall "INCREDIBLY OVERRATED" vs. Ciryl Gane
articles.description: Jon Jones went on the record to call Tom Aspinall "INCREDIBLY OVERRATED" after seeing him fight one round against Ciryl Gane in the heavyweight championship fight that was ruled a no contest. Daniel Cormier gives his take on Jones' comments, and reveals EXACTLY WHY Jon is saying those things about Tom. DC says Jon isn't telling the whole truth because Tom is still technically his competition since Jones came back to the UFC and MMA from retirement. Don't miss Cormier's unfiltered take on Jones' viral video and what he thought of the Aspinall-Gane fight! All lines provided by @hardrockbet Follow me on all social media platforms! articles.title: 'Will Islam JOIN THE GOATS at UFC 322?!' | Makhachev vs JDM Preview
